nodes.text: Wistie Fest pie was a pie edible by Ewoks. In order to prepare for the Ewok Festival of the Wisties on the Forest Moon of Endor, the wizard Logray gave a list of tasks to the young Ewoks Wicket Wystri Warrick and Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka. The last item on the list was to pick a bushel of ripe rainbow berries in order to make a large Wistie Fest pie for the festival. The pie was made with a beige, circular crust, and the berries were turned into a pink filling. During the festival, Wicket's mother, Shodu Warrick, held the pie.
Wistie Fest pie appeared in the 1986 young readers book Fuzzy as an Ewok, which was written by Virginia Holt and illustrated by Deborah Colvin Borgo.
